channel.title: Nemesis::::Re-written
channel.description:
Yup, since I had no help AT ALL with my errors, I couldn't fix it, so I decided to keep working on my special server.
1. New source 2. Added forums 3. Full Specials 4. DDS, Maul, Dhally hit double spec! 5. Almost all skills work, including: Attack Strength Defence Range Prayer Magic Runecrafting Hitpoints Agility Thieving Crafting Fletching Smithing Fishing Cooking Firemaking
Need some tutorials for the rest of the skills: Slayer-Guess I can just make certian NPC's give Slayer XP. Construction Better Fletching-I mean 100%, with the interfaces too, I have 99% right now. Farming Hunter No-IP: I believe I got no-ip working, need it tested first in a bit.
6. Added the best welcome screen possible. 7. ELEMENTAL ROBES 8. FULL Edgeville 9. FULL Fally 10. FULL Catherby (MUST FISH OWN FOOD!) 11. Figher Torso Minigame 12. Dark Bow (1/3 chance of doing double dmg, special always does double +extra dmg!) 13. Almost FULL fishing! (You can fish without the items to fish with though, like a harpoon etc.) 14. Almost NO lag! 15. New client 16. Better background 17. SKULLING!!! 18. Need to use client, or you can't see text, damage, or your HP, and of course, the skulls! 19. Skill Capes-Get when you get 100 in a skill 20. Max skill is 100 21. Max combat is 127 22. Client will be released shortly, but it won't be editable, it'll be closed source, and the port will stay at 43594 23. You can enter your own IP on the client
Pics coming soon!
Expected up-time:July 10th, 2007 ^ Expected if I can get 19/22? skills working, I think 22 is the total amount of skills possible.
Number of working skills: 16/22?
WEBSITE: Going to get approval for it.

item.title: Nemesis::::Re-written
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

Yup, since I had no help AT ALL with my errors, I couldn’t fix it, so I decided to keep working on my special server.

  1. New source
  2. Added forums
  3. Full Specials
  4. DDS, Maul, Dhally hit double spec!
  5. Almost all skills work, including:
    Attack
    Strength
    Defence
    Range
    Prayer
    Magic
    Runecrafting
    Hitpoints
    Agility
    Thieving
    Crafting
    Fletching
    Smithing
    Fishing
    Cooking
    Firemaking

Need some tutorials for the rest of the skills:
Slayer-Guess I can just make certian NPC’s give Slayer XP.
Construction
Better Fletching-I mean 100%, with the interfaces too, I have 99% right now.
Farming
Hunter
No-IP:
I believe I got no-ip working, need it tested first in a bit.

  1. Added the best welcome screen possible.
  2. ELEMENTAL ROBES
  3. FULL Edgeville
  4. FULL Fally
  5. FULL Catherby (MUST FISH OWN FOOD!)
  6. Figher Torso Minigame
  7. Dark Bow (1/3 chance of doing double dmg, special always does double +extra dmg!)
  8. Almost FULL fishing! (You can fish without the items to fish with though, like a harpoon etc.)
  9. Almost NO lag!
  10. New client
  11. Better background
  12. SKULLING!!!
  13. Need to use client, or you can’t see text, damage, or your HP, and of course, the skulls!
  14. Skill Capes-Get when you get 100 in a skill
  15. Max skill is 100
  16. Max combat is 127
  17. Client will be released shortly, but it won’t be editable, it’ll be closed source, and the port will stay at 43594
  18. You can enter your own IP on the client

Pics coming soon!

Expected up-time:July 10th, 2007
^
Expected if I can get 19/22? skills working, I think 22 is the total amount of skills possible.

Number of working skills:
16/22?

WEBSITE:
Going to get approval for it.

Read full topic
